Articles.Content:
biplanes! what else can I say. they look cool and are easily maneuverable. Here\'s mine, I guess its not the best design out there but feel free to share yours aswell!

here\'s me trying to land the bugger

You can use F1 to make in-game screenshots.

on-topic: Pretty cool!
There\'s another kind of link piece, the 'small hardpoint,' that isn\'t a stage separator. Right now, you are one spacebar away from ejecting your wings in flight.

While not -exactly- a bi-plane (and not stock), here\'s a 15.2 craft of mine dubbed the 'Palmer 13'. I feel it\'s bi-plane enough to fit in here.

Using the Damned Aerospace mod for the props, and NovaPunch for the gear attachment struts.

And... one from the front for convenience\'s sake.

There\'s another kind of link piece, the 'small hardpoint,' that isn\'t a stage separator. Right now, you are one spacebar away from ejecting your wings in flight.

I\'ve made sure to keep my fingers far away from the space bar at all time while flying this thing

btw I can get lift-off at 30m/s with my current design I\'m also going to attempt a triplane. but I do not count on the structural integrity of this thing as it is!
